00029 
00030 namespace egui { 
00031 
00032 
00033 class critical_section {
00034     // you are not allowed assign another object to this
00035     // we are talking about Critical Sections here
00036     critical_section & operator = ( const critical_section & Not_Implemented);
00037     // CHG john.torjo, 3/14/2003 - copy-construction is disabled
00038     critical_section( const critical_section & From);
00039 
00040 public:
00041     critical_section() ;
00042     ~critical_section() ;
00043     void Lock() ;
00044     void Unlock() ;
00045 
00046 private:
00047     struct impl;
00048     mutable std::auto_ptr<impl> m_impl;
00049 };
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053 /*
00054     allows automatic Locking/ Unlocking of a Resource,
00055     protected by a Critical Section:
00056 */
00057 class scoped_lock
00058 {
00059     // not implemented - see Usage!!!
00060     scoped_lock operator=( scoped_lock & Not_Implemented);
00061     scoped_lock( const scoped_lock & Not_Implemented);
00062 
00063 public:
00064     scoped_lock( critical_section & csResource) : m_csResource( csResource) {
00065         m_csResource.Lock();
00066     }
00067     ~scoped_lock() {
00068         m_csResource.Unlock();
00069     }
00070 
00071 private:
00072     // the Critical Section for this resource
00073     critical_section & m_csResource;
00074 };
00075 
00076 }
